EmailTemplate.description: Email sent to Helpline Patients interested in TAP
EmailTemplate.name: Patient Community Tap Invitation
EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to the MyKomen Community
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Account.Name},
To find out more about the TAP application process join us at MyKomen!
To get started, go to https://sltod-mykomen.cs41.force.com/s/
Thanks, {!Organization.Name} sgkencrypt Warmly, Susan G. Komen
This message was sent to {!Account.PersonEmail} For breast health or breast cancer information, please call the Breast Care Helpline: 1-877 GO KOMEN (1-877-465-6636) | helpline@komen.org
